医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
外螺纹低温样品储存管Ziath 报告了其 2 ml CryzoTraq™ 2-ECT 存储管如何通过最大限度地减少交叉污染的机会来保持样品的高度完整性，因为其外螺纹设计消除了样品遇到螺纹的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Externally-threaded-cryogenic-sample-storage-tubes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Externally-threaded-cryogenic-sample-storage-tubes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cd6dc8b-6fa0-4ac0-8610-83e26276d2c8 Thu, 17 Aug 2023 01:06:00 -0400 Externally threaded cryogenic sample storage tubes
先前接种疫苗可能有助于预防阿尔茨海默病事先接种过破伤风和白喉疫苗，无论是否患有百日咳（Tdap/Td）；带状疱疹（HZ），俗称带状疱疹；根据休斯敦大学健康中心的最新研究，肺炎球菌和肺炎球菌都与降低患阿尔茨海默病的风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Prior-vaccinations-may-help-protect-against-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Prior-vaccinations-may-help-protect-against-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58cbafc1-cacb-4fb1-a9b4-9db3b78a9232 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 23:16:00 -0400 Prior vaccinations may help protect against Alzheimer's disease
只有一小部分患有早期阿尔茨海默病的老年人有资格接受新疗法只有一小部分处于阿尔茨海默病早期阶段的老年人符合接受新的单克隆抗体治疗的资格标准，这些药物针对大脑中的淀粉样β斑块，这是阿尔茨海默病的早期症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Only-a-small-percentage-of-older-adults-with-early-Alzheimers-eligible-for-new-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Only-a-small-percentage-of-older-adults-with-early-Alzheimers-eligible-for-new-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20525795-120f-4f65-b4d0-760a8ee1fa9d Wed, 16 Aug 2023 23:09:10 -0400 Only a small percentage of older adults with early Alzheimer's eligible for new treatments
西班牙流感大流行与低出生体重和死产增加有关根据本周发表在开放获取期刊 PLOS ONE 上的一项新研究，瑞士大学 Kaspar Staub 本周发表的一项新研究显示，1918/1919 年“西班牙流感”流感大流行后，瑞士女性出生体重过轻和死产的可能性增加瑞士苏黎世和同事们。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Spanish-flu-pandemic-linked-to-increase-in-low-birth-weight-and-stillbirth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Spanish-flu-pandemic-linked-to-increase-in-low-birth-weight-and-stillbirth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8f028a9-bcf2-435f-bf01-7579efc69a37 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 22:53:02 -0400 Spanish flu pandemic linked to increase in low birth weight and stillbirth
线粒体功能障碍可能是精神分裂症的一个原因罗格斯大学和埃默里大学的研究人员通过研究已知最强的遗传风险因素，深入了解精神分裂症的发病机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Mitochondria-dysfunction-may-be-a-contributor-to-schizophrenia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Mitochondria-dysfunction-may-be-a-contributor-to-schizophrenia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61a2a5b0-84d0-4c37-ad1e-25b17c2366ba Wed, 16 Aug 2023 22:40:26 -0400 Mitochondrial dysfunction may be a contributor to schizophrenia
授予 750,000 美元培训计划补助金以支持工业卫生计划美国国立卫生研究院下属的国家职业安全与健康研究所向梅尔和伊妮德·祖克曼公共卫生学院的研究人员提供了 75 万美元的培训计划补助金，以支持工业卫生项目的硕士生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/24750000-training-program-grant-awarded-to-support-the-Industrial-Hygiene-Program.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/24750000-training-program-grant-awarded-to-support-the-Industrial-Hygiene-Program.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b06c748-410b-4ed0-9d9c-76aae2aa49ab Wed, 16 Aug 2023 22:35:01 -0400 $750,000 training program grant awarded to support the Industrial Hygiene Program
研究揭示低温如何影响食欲斯克里普斯研究中心的神经科学家已经发现，当哺乳动物暴露在寒冷的温度下时，大脑回路会导致它们想要吃得更多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Study-sheds-light-on-how-cold-Temperatures-affect-appetite.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Study-sheds-light-on-how-cold-Temperatures-affect-appetite.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee2717b4-59f5-4074-be7f-797c218ca31a Wed, 16 Aug 2023 22:30:51 -0400 Study sheds light on how cold temperatures affect appetite
研究人员开发出快速可靠的 SARS-CoV-2 检测新方法市售质谱仪可以可靠地检测 SARS-CoV-2 冠状病毒。哈勒维滕贝格马丁路德大学 (MLU) 的研究人员在《临床蛋白质组学》杂志上提出了一种新方法，该方法采用医院和实验室已使用的设备来检测细菌和真菌感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Researchers-develop-new-rapid-and-reliable-method-for-SARS-CoV-2-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Researchers-develop-new-rapid-and-reliable-method-for-SARS-CoV-2-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5677b818-a044-4ddf-9dc3-935238ba0338 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 22:23:11 -0400 Researchers develop new rapid and reliable method for SARS-CoV-2 detection
研究表明牙齿可能能够将抗体保存数百年一项新研究发现，牙齿可以将抗体保存数百年，使科学家能够研究人类传染病的历史。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Teeth-may-be-able-to-preserve-antibodies-for-hundreds-of-years-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Teeth-may-be-able-to-preserve-antibodies-for-hundreds-of-years-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d848036f-32ce-4cbc-b286-3e38928c094a Wed, 16 Aug 2023 21:51:20 -0400 Teeth may be able to preserve antibodies for hundreds of years, study reveals
一些早期、低风险乳腺癌患者术后可能不需要放疗根据麦克马斯特大学、不列颠哥伦比亚省癌症中心、汉密尔顿健康科学公司和不列颠哥伦比亚大学领导的最新研究，一些患有早期低风险乳腺癌的女性在保乳手术后可能不需要放疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Some-early-stage-low-risk-breast-cancer-患者-may-not-need-radiotherapy-after-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Some-early-stage-low-risk-breast-cancer-患者-may-not-need-radiotherapy-after-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d90d8640-27a1-4640-a197-3823fad41c5f Wed, 16 Aug 2023 21:45:06 -0400 Some early-stage, low-risk breast cancer patients may not need radiotherapy after surgery
